scripts.format: wp-scripts format && wp-scripts lint-js --fix && wp-scripts lint-style --fix && composer phpcbf && composer normalize
scripts.lint: tsc && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && composer phpstan && composer phpcs && composer normalize --dry-run && npm run transform-readme
scripts.plugin-zip: npm run transform-readme && git archive --format=zip --output=wp-plugin-template.zip --add-file readme.txt HEAD && zip wp-plugin-template.zip -d README.md
